transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello. Hi, am I speaking with Preeti Shuri?
Speaker A: Yes.
Speaker B: Hi, this is Hussain. I'm calling from University College London. Accommodation portal powered by Amber Student. I was calling regarding your accommodation in London.
Speaker A: Yes, please. Yes please.
Speaker B: Perfect. So could you please help me out with few details before I go forward? I can see you have checked. Go Britannia, Kings Cross residence, London. Done. Correct?
Speaker A: Yes, I have.
Speaker B: All right. So did you like that option or would you want me to share you some other options?
Speaker A: No, I think it's just that I'm coming with a 16 year old and the whole point is to make her understand about much accommodation, you know, so I don't want to be. I think the only the I did not understand about this accommodation was if they allow a short stay or is it only stay because it is only for three nights.
Speaker B: Understood. So you said you're looking for a 16 year old. So you're not a student?
Speaker A: No, I'm coming as well. I'm a researcher. I'm the mother.
Speaker B: All right. And perfect. So could you please let me know one more thing like the student will be living alone, right? Or you are planning to move in.
Speaker A: With the student with me.
Speaker B: All right. You're planning to move in with this student?
Speaker A: Yeah. Yes. We need for three nights only.
Speaker B: Understood? Understood. And you are a student also, I assume?
Speaker A: No, I'm a doctor. I'm a surgeon.
Speaker B: You are a working professional researcher.
Speaker A: Yes.
Speaker B: All right. All right. And now what is the moving date you're looking for?
Speaker A: But I'm into research right now because are looking for the 8th of December.
Speaker B: The 8th of December.
Speaker A: Yes.
Speaker B: And what is the name of the student?
Speaker A: How does that matter? Can you just help me with accommodation? Is it available or not? And then you can go further.
Speaker B: The thing is I would like to tell you like before moving forward, I need to collect the information. I need to request the property with the custom information that this is the student and this is the sister.
Speaker A: That's no problem. I'll. I will do it my own then. No problem at all. Thank you for your call. Thank you for your call.

tasks.description: Clarify accommodation options regarding short stay availability for a 16-year-old accompanied by parent at Go Britannia, Kings Cross residence.
tasks.source_reference: Call on 2025-11-03 where client asked if short stay is allowed for 3 nights.

tasks.description: Request and collect the name and details of the student to proceed with accommodation request.
tasks.source_reference: Agent requested student name during call on 2025-11-03 but client refused to provide.

tasks.description: Follow up with client to confirm accommodation availability and clarify short stay policy for parent and 16-year-old student for 3 nights starting 8th December.
tasks.source_reference: Client ended call on 2025-11-03 after refusal to provide student name.

tasks_actionables.last_agent_response: Agent requested student name and details to proceed with accommodation request but client declined and ended call.
tasks_actionables.suggested_next_step: Agent to follow up with client to clarify short stay options and request necessary student details to confirm booking availability.

accommodation_preferences.budget_range: Weekly budget in pounds (exact amount not specified)
accommodation_preferences.special_requirements: Accommodation must allow short stay (3 nights) for both mother and 16-year-old daughter living together

agent_notes.complexity: Moderate complexity due to short stay and co-occupancy with minor
